Files

lottie2webp/
lottie2webp.rs

1use clap::Parser;
2use lottieconv::Converter;
3use rlottie::Animation;
4use std::{fs::File, io::Write, path::PathBuf};
5
6/// Convert lottie files WEBP.
7#[derive(Parser)]
8struct Args {
9	/// The location of the lottie file.
10	#[clap(name = "lottieFileName")]
11	lottie_file_name: PathBuf,
12
13	/// The output file.
14	#[clap(short = 'o', long = "out", name = "output")]
15	output: Option<PathBuf>
16}
17
18fn main() {
19	let args = Args::parse();
20	let path = args.lottie_file_name;
21
22	println!("Converting file {} ...", path.display());
23	let player = Animation::from_file(&path).expect("Failed to open file");
24	let webp_path = match args.output {
25		Some(path) => path,
26		None => {
27			let file_stem = path.file_stem().expect("Missing file stem");
28			let mut webp_path = path.clone();
29			let mut webp_file_name = file_stem.to_owned();
30			webp_file_name.push(".webp");
31			webp_path.set_file_name(webp_file_name);
32			webp_path
33		}
34	};
35	let webp = Converter::new(player)
36		.webp()
37		.and_then(Converter::convert)
38		.expect("Conversion failed");
39	let mut out = File::create(&webp_path).expect("Failed to create output file");
40	out.write_all(&webp).expect("Failed to write output file");
41}
42
43#[cfg(test)]
44mod tests {
45	use super::*;
46
47	#[test]
48	fn verify_cli() {
49		use clap::CommandFactory;
50		Args::command().debug_assert()
51	}
52}
